title: Enhancing Programming Thinking Skills Through Simulation-Based Debugging Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic programming concepts (variables, conditionals, loops, etc.)
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized VR simulation utilization for PC-free environments, integrated with project-based learning in social studies curriculum

learning_goals: Learners can debug sample code containing logical errors with over 80% accuracy
Learners can propose complex coding problem-solving strategies three or more times through collaborative discussions
Learners can explain three or more of their own learning patterns based on biometric data (eye-tracking, facial expression analysis) collected in VR environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
